verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, that <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%>, he <S%G3332>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>;
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>.

¶ The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3985>tempting<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Is it <S%G1487%G1832>lawful<s%> for a <S%G444>man<s%> to put <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G2596>for<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Have ye <S%G314><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> read <S%G314><s%> , that <S%G3754><s%> he which <S%G3588><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them at <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> male <S%G730><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> female <S%G2338><s%> ,

And <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> , For this <S%G5127><s%> cause <S%G1752><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shall cleave <S%G4347><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> they twain <S%G1417><s%> shall be <S%G2071%G1519><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> ?

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> twain <S%G1417><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> . What <S%G3739><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath joined together <S%G4801><s%> , let <S%G5563><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G444><s%> put asunder <S%G5563><s%> .

They <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5101>Why<s%> did <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1781>command<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> a <S%G975>writing<s%> of <S%G647>divorcement<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G630>put<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G630>away<s%>?

He <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846%G3754>them<s%>, Moses <S%G3475><s%> because of <S%G4314><s%> the hardness <S%G4641><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G4641><s%> suffered <S%G2010><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> to put away <S%G630><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> wives <S%G1135><s%> : but <S%G1161><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213%G3754><s%> , Whosoever <S%G3739%G302><s%> shall put away <S%G630><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> , except <S%G1508><s%> it be for <S%G1909><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shall marry <S%G1060><s%> another <S%G243><s%> , committeth adultery <S%G3429><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> whoso marrieth <S%G1060><s%> her which <S%G3588><s%> is put away <S%G630><s%> doth commit adultery <S%G3429><s%> .

¶ <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> the <S%G156>case<s%> of the <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2076>be<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%>, it <S%G4851>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4851>good<s%> to <S%G1060>marry<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> men cannot <S%G3756><s%> receive <S%G5562><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> , save <S%G235><s%> they to whom <S%G3739><s%> it is given <S%G1325><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> some eunuchs <S%G2135><s%> , which <S%G3748><s%> were so <S%G3779><s%> born <S%G1080><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> their mother's <S%G3384><s%> womb <S%G2836><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> some eunuchs <S%G2135><s%> , which <S%G3748><s%> were made eunuchs <S%G2134><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> men <S%G444><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> there be <S%G1526><s%> eunuchs <S%G2135><s%> , which <S%G3748><s%> have made <S%G2134><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> eunuchs <S%G2134><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven's sake <S%G3772><s%> . He that is able <S%G1410><s%> to receive <S%G5562><s%> it , let him receive <S%G5562><s%> it .

¶ <S%G5119>Then<s%> were there <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> little <S%G3813>children<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G2007>put<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, Suffer <S%G863><s%> little children <S%G3813><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> forbid <S%G2967><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> , to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> of such <S%G5108><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, and <S%G4198>departed<s%> <S%G1564>thence<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G18>Good<s%> <S%G1320>Master<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> good <S%G18>thing<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> callest thou <S%G3004><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> good <S%G18><s%> ? there is none <S%G3762><s%> good <S%G18><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> , that is , God <S%G2316><s%> : but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> thou wilt <S%G2309><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> , keep <S%G5083><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> .

He <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4169%G1161>Which<s%>? <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, Thou shalt do <S%G5407><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> murder <S%G5407><s%> , Thou shalt <S%G3431><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%> , Thou shalt <S%G2813><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%> , Thou shalt <S%G5576><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bear false witness <S%G5576><s%> ,

Honour <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy mother <S%G3384><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> , Thou shalt love <S%G25><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> neighbour <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> .

The young <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3956>All<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> have I <S%G5442>kept<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> youth <S%G3503>up<s%>: <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5302>lack<s%> I <S%G2089>yet<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> thou wilt <S%G2309><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> , go <S%G5217><s%> and sell <S%G4453><s%> that thou <S%G4675><s%> hast <S%G5224><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> to the poor <S%G4434><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1204><s%> and follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> .

<S%G1161>But<s%> when the young <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G3056>saying<s%>, he went <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3076>sorrowful<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2192%G2258>had<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G2933>possessions<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , That <S%G3754><s%> a rich man <S%G4145><s%> shall hardly <S%G1423><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , It is <S%G2076><s%> easier <S%G2123><s%> for a camel <S%G2574><s%> to go <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the eye <S%G5169><s%> of a needle <S%G4476><s%> , than <S%G2228><s%> for a rich man <S%G4145><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> .

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they were <S%G4970>exceedingly<s%> <S%G1605>amazed<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> be <S%G4982>saved<s%>?

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1689>beheld<s%> them, and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, With <S%G3844><s%> men <S%G444><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> impossible <S%G102><s%> ; but <S%G1161><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> possible <S%G1415><s%> .

¶ <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G863>forsaken<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>; <S%G5101>what<s%> shall <S%G2254>we<s%> <S%G2071>have<s%> <S%G686>therefore<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , That <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> have followed <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> , in <S%G1722><s%> the regeneration <S%G3824><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall sit <S%G2523><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> , ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> shall sit <S%G2523><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%> , judging <S%G2919><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> one <S%G3739><s%> that hath forsaken <S%G863><s%> houses <S%G3614><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> sisters <S%G79><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> lands <S%G68><s%> , for my <S%G3450><s%> name's <S%G3686><s%> sake <S%G1752><s%> , shall receive <S%G2983><s%> an hundredfold <S%G1542><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shall inherit <S%G2816><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> .
But <S%G1161><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> that are first <S%G4413><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> shall be first <S%G4413><s%> .
